text: The 50th Rifle Corps was a corps of the Soviet Red Army. It was part of the 23rd Army on 22 June 1941. It took part in the Great Patriotic War. == Organization == On 22 June 1941, the corps included the following units: * 43rd Rifle Division * 70th Rifle Division * 123rd Rifle Division == Commanders == * Komkor Filipp D. Gorelenko (08.1939 - 05.1940) * Komkor Panteleimon Zaitsev (05.1940 - 08.1940) * Major General V. I. S'cherbakov (17.01.1941 - 04.08.1941) * Major General Pavel Batitsky (25.04.1944 - 27.05.1944) == References == === Citations === === Bibliography === * Category:Rifle corps of the Soviet Union
title: 50th Rifle Corps
